text: The Little Darling is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Little DarlingPaolo Cherchi Usai. The Griffith Project, Volume 11 and stars Mary Pickford, Mack Sennett, and John R. Cumpson. ==Actors== * Mary Pickford * Mack Sennett * John R. Cumpson * Owen Moore * Arthur V. Johnson ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Little Darling
